name: 2024 8th International Conference on Digital Technology in Education
content: Conference Proceedings: Submissions will be peer-reviewed by 2-3 technical committee or reviewers. Accepted and registered papers of ICDTE 2024 will be published in the ICDTE 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be included in the Online Digital Library and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
